meta_title: Boys beige suit | Page boy suits | Boys wedding suit | Wesley |
meta_description: Boys 3 piece beige suit, 'Wesley'. Boys wedding suit, available in sizes 1 - 12 years. More boys formal wear at www.rococlothing.co.uk
description:
We proudly introduce the 'Wesley' as a dignified and high quality tailored addition to our premier range of boys suits. Designed with an intricate biscuit beige striped patterning, this matching 3 piece is on trend for this season and established for a highly stylish and conventional look during those big occasions.

Mindful thought and care goes into the craftsmanship of this outfit, offering a light weight comfortable feel with flexibility whilst maintaining a well groomed image at weddings, dinner parties, christenings and other special occasions.

Shirt and shoes not included with this outfit but we recommend our stunning cream Italian collar shirt and our brown high quality lace-ups to complement the beige tones.
